question: 楽
sourceAnswer:
<read>らく</read>:: comfort/ease/relief/(at)-peace/relaxation | easy/simple/without-trouble/without-hardships | (economically)-comfortable | raku-pottery | sukha-(happiness)
<read>がく</read>:: music | old-Japanese-court-music/gagaku
